short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Генерация распостранённых РФ кредов (credentials) типа ИНН, СНИЛС, КПП и т.д. и вставка их в активный инпут.
short.en: This extension allows you to generate RU credentials such as INN, SNILS, KPP, etc. and insert them into the active input.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides a right click context menus to paste generated RU credentials to the active input.
It can be useful for testing purposes in cases when you need provide complex RU credentials with validation rules such as INN, SNILS, OGRN and you don't want to use online tools to generate it and copy/pasting by hand.
This extension doesn't not contain sending request logic to generate data, all things happen by javascript in real time.
This extension works with simple & masked input (created by react-input-mask for example).
